ROW.Name: Gaotianliang
ROW.Profile: He is the second person in China to win the championship in the fitness competition. He looks thin, but he has extremely rich sports experience and management plan.

ROW.Name: Gaozhenning
ROW.Profile: He is the first coach in China to win the fitness world competition. He was praised for his rebellious character. His personality charm deeply affected his students.

ROW.Name: Mabaoguo
ROW.Profile: He is the founder of Hunyuan Taijiquan Association, and he calls himself "the leader of Hunyuan Xingyi Taijiquan". He combined Chinese martial arts with fitness and opened up a new way of fitness.

ROW.Name: Mike Tyson
ROW.Profile: He is a heavyweight coach who has conquered the fitness field of the world with his strong muscles. He has great strength and courage.

ROW.Name: Lixianghe
ROW.Profile: He is the God in the field of fitness. He has won three champions in the fitness world competition with his rich experience. Although he is thin and weak, it contains infinite energy.

ROW.Name: Angela Ziegler
ROW.Profile: She uses her gentle face to cure the fatigue of fitness people. It makes her very attractive. She uses reasonable methods to make people less tired when they are working out.

ROW.Name: Yoona
ROW.Profile: She uses her and her healing smile to make every gymnast more committed to continuous fitness. Her class is very popular.
